contentrichtext.text: {{taxobox |name = ''Bambusa'' {{italictitle}} |image = Bambusa oldhamii form.jpg |image_caption = ''[[Bambusa oldhamii]]'' |regnum = [[Plantae]] |unranked_divisio = [[Angiosperms]] |unranked_classis = [[Monocots]] |unranked_ordo = [[Commelinids]] |ordo = [[Poales]] |familia = [[Poaceae]] |subfamilia = [[Bambusoideae]] |supertribus = [[Bambusodae]] |tribus = [[Bambuseae]] |subtribus = [[Bambusinae]] |genus = '''''Bambusa''''' |genus_authority = [[Schreb.]] |type_species = ''[[Bambusa bambos]]'' <small>([[L.]]) [[wikispecies:Andreas Voss|Voss]]</small><ref name=GRIN>{{cite web|title=Genus: Bambusa Schreb.|url=http://www.ars-grin.gov/cgi-bin/npgs/html/genus.pl?1263|work=Germplasm Resources Information Network (GRIN)|accessdate=24 January 2012}}</ref> |synonyms = ''Arundarbor'' <small>Kuntze</small> <br /> ''Bambos'' <small>Retz.</small><br /> ''Bambus'' <small>J. F. Gmel.</small><br /> ''Dendrocalamopsis'' <small>(L.C.Chia & H.L.Fung) Q.H.Dai & X.L.Tao</small><br /> ''Ischurochloa'' <small>BÃ¼se</small><br /> ''Leleba'' <small>Nakai</small><br /> ''Lingnania'' <small>McClure</small><br /> ''Tetragonocalamus'' <small>Nakai</small> |}} '''''Bambusa''''' is a large [[genus]] of about 130 [[species]] of clumping [[bamboo]]s.<ref name=Kew>{{cite web|title=Bambusa|url=http://www.theplantlist.org/browse/A/Poaceae/Bambusa/|work=The Plant List, RBG Kew|accessdate=24 January 2012}}</ref> These species are usually giant ones, with numerous branches at a node and one or two much larger than the rest. They are found in [[Tropics|tropical]] and [[subtropical]] areas of [[Asia]], especially in the wet [[Tropics]]. ==Select Species== *''[[Bambusa arnhemica]]'' *''[[Bambusa balcooa]]'' *''[[Bambusa bambos]]'' *''[[Bambusa blumeana]]'' *[[Bambusa chungii]] *''[[Bambusa lako]]'' *''[[Bambusa longispiculata]]'' *''[[Bambusa oldhamii]]'' *''[[Bambusa tulda]]'' *''[[Bambusa ventricosa]]'' *''[[Bambusa vulgaris]]'' ==References== {{reflist|2}} [[Category:Bamboo genera]] [[Category:Garden plants of Asia|Bamboo]] {{Bamboo-stub}}
